Text: Thomas Cook  Failure would result in UK's biggest peacetime repatriation of 150,000 holidaymakers  Sean Farrell  Thomas Cook is trying to sell its Nordic airline and tour operating division to raise funds to see it through winter.
Effect: UK's biggest peacetime repatriation of 150,000 holidaymakers  Sean Farrell  Thomas Cook is trying to sell its Nordic airline and tour operating division to raise funds to see it through winter.
Sentence: <e1>Thomas Cook  Failure</e1> would result in <e2>UK's biggest peacetime repatriation of 150,000 holidaymakers  Sean Farrell  Thomas Cook is trying to sell its Nordic airline and tour operating division to raise funds to see it through winter.</e2>
